name: Hard Food Ingredients Quiz / Test | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many eyes does a coconut have?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Coconuts are the fruit of the coconut palm trees. Its meat is called copra.

questions.text: Which dish is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Risotto.

	It's a rice dish. All the others are egg dishes.

questions.text: Are traditional cucumber flowers bisexual or unisexual?
questions.explanation:
Unisexual & unisexual.

	Cucumbers are a member of the gourd family. If they turn yellow they are not good to eat. The plant produces male flowers first, then the female ones.

questions.text: Tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese give us what salad?
What beer was once advertised as being' from the land of sky blue waters'?
Prepared mustard can be stored for up to two years?
Carrots are rich in which vitamin?
questions.explanation:
A.

	The value of carotene ( vitamin A ) was discovered in the 20th century.

questions.text: Impanato means to do what to foods?
Which of the following is not in the lily family?
questions.explanation:
Lettuce.

	Lettuce is a garden herb ( lactucs sativa )

questions.text: What is ground up to make marzipan?
questions.explanation:
Almonds.

	Made of crushed almonds or almond paste,sugar and egg whites.
